name: SalmonellosisTestsForSalmonellaExceptSTyphiAndSParatyphiNucleicAcid
title: Salmonellosis (Tests for Salmonella except S. typhi and S. paratyphi Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of salmonella sp and subtypes nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory test name ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: component: salmonella nucleic acid;  

LOINC search: 'Salmonella nucleic acid -typhi -paratyphi'),(Exclusion Criteria: component: Salmonella typhi or Salmonella paratyphi)
